summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, allowing principal use parking as an interim use on eligible lots in all zones within the Station Area Overlay District in Southeast Seattle, except within the boundaries of the North Beacon Hill station area, and on lots occupied or owned by institutions within one quarter mile of a light rail station, where principal use parking is not otherwise permitted, providing for waiver of development standards, amending Sections 23.42.040, 23.76.004, 23.76.006, and 23.76.032 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
